project.name: ZOE scope
project.description: Sleep Coaching Platform V1.0 - Complete technical scope with 5 major components. Timeline: 14-16 weeks. Total effort: 2,452-3,374 hours. Details in component tasks.

full_issue.title: Component 1: 14-Day Onboarding Journey
full_issue.description:
## Overview

Comprehensive sleep profile capture through structured daily engagement over 14 days.

## Key Features

* **84 Questions** across 14 themed groups
* **Daily Unlock System** - One group per day at user's chosen time
* **42 AI Insights** - 3 personalized insights per group (ðŸ’¡ Analysis, ðŸ§  Fact, âœ… Action)
* **Swipeable Interface** - Instagram/TikTok-style vertical navigation
* **Themed Backgrounds** - Unique gradient and ambient animations per group

## Question Structure (from Sleep_360_UPDATED.xlsx)

* Day 1: Sleep Quality Overview (3 Q)
* Day 2: Sleep Disruptions (6 Q)
* Day 3: Temperature & Comfort (4 Q)
* Day 4: Sleep Schedule & Duration (6 Q)
* Day 5: Circadian Rhythm & Timing (7 Q)
* Day 6: Eating & Meal Timing (6 Q)
* Day 7: Bedtime Routine & Screens (5 Q)
* Day 8: Caffeine & Alcohol (7 Q)
* Day 9: Sleep Environment (9 Q)
* Day 10: Napping & Daytime Sleep (4 Q)
* Day 11: Medical & Medications (9 Q)
* Day 12: Physical Activity (6 Q)
* Day 13: Stress & Mental Health (9 Q)
* Day 14: Chronotype & Preferences (9 Q)

## Estimated Effort

* **Development:** 234-318 hours
* **Content Creation:** 160-230 hours
* **Total:** 394-548 hours (10-14 weeks)

## Key Tasks

* Backend schema for 84 questions
* Daily unlock mechanism with notifications
* Conditional insight generation logic (CRITICAL)
* Swipeable card interface
* 14 themed group screens
* Content creation for 42 insight variants
* Medical/scientific review

## Assignments

* **Martin:** Testing, content creation, medical review coordination
* **Christophe:** UI/UX design, animations, themed backgrounds
* **AI Vibe Coding:** Backend, logic engines, UI implementation

tasks.title: Backend schema (84 questions + answers)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Database schema for 84 questions across 14 themed groups

**Requirements:**

* 14 question groups (1 per day)
* Question types: Multiple choice, sliders (4-12 hour ranges), yes/no, frequency scales, time inputs
* Store user responses with timestamps
* Track completion status per group

* Day 4: Sleep Schedule & Duration (6 questions)
* Day 5: Circadian Rhythm & Timing (7 questions)
* Day 6: Eating & Meal Timing (6 questions)
* Day 7: Bedtime Routine & Screens (5 questions)
* Day 8: Caffeine & Alcohol (7 questions)
* Day 9: Sleep Environment (9 questions)
* Day 10: Napping & Daytime Sleep (4 questions)
* Day 11: Medical & Medications (9 questions)
* Day 12: Physical Activity (6 questions)

* Day 14: Chronotype & Preferences (9 questions)

**Deliverables:**

* Database schema design
* Data models for questions, answers, groups
* Migration scripts

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Daily unlock mechanism (time-gated)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Time-based unlock system for daily question groups

**Requirements:**

* User sets preferred unlock time (e.g., 8:00 AM)
* Groups unlock sequentially (cannot skip ahead)
* Day 1 available immediately after signup
* Day 2+ unlock at user's chosen time
* Show countdown timer for next unlock
* Persist unlock state across sessions

**Technical Details:**

* Timezone handling for global users
* Background job to check unlock times
* Push notification when new group unlocks
* Handle edge cases (timezone changes, missed days)

**UI Elements:**

* "Next group unlocks in: XX hours"
* Locked group indicators with countdown
* Animation when group unlocks

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Question UI components (9 input types)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Reusable question input components

**Input Types:**

1. **Slider (numeric range):** 4-12 hours, with labels at endpoints
2. **Multiple choice (single select):** Radio buttons with visual feedback
3. **Multiple choice (multi-select):** Checkboxes
4. **Yes/No/Sometimes:** 3-button toggle
5. **Frequency scale:** Never / Rarely / Sometimes / Often / Always
6. **Time input:** 12-hour format with AM/PM picker
7. **Text input:** Short answer (medications, notes)
8. **Rating scale:** 1-10 with emoji indicators
9. **Duration picker:** Hours and minutes

**Design Requirements:**

* Large tap targets (mobile-first)
* Smooth animations between selections
* Validation for required fields
* Progress indicator showing answered vs total questions
* Auto-save on selection

**Assignment:** Christophe (UX/UI design) + AI Vibe Coding (implementation)

tasks.title: Insight generation logic (42 insights)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Conditional logic engine for personalized insights (3 per group = 42 total)

**CRITICAL COMPONENT - High complexity**

**Structure per Group:**

* ðŸ’¡ Personalized Insight: 4-6 variants based on answer patterns
* ðŸ§  Did You Know: Scientific fact related to their responses
* âœ… Action Item: Single actionable step for tonight

**Example (Group 1 - Sleep Quality):**

```
IF quality_score >= 8 AND rarely_refreshed:
  Insight: "Despite rating your sleep highly, you rarely feel refreshed. 
   This disconnect could indicate sleep apnea fragmenting your sleep..."
  
ELSE IF quality_score 6-7:
  Insight: "Your sleep quality is good but inconsistent. The gap between
   your current rating and excellent sleep is achievable within a month."
```

**Requirements:**

* 42 insight cards total (14 groups Ã— 3 cards)
* Each insight has 3-6 conditional variants
* Priority system for selecting which variant to show
* Content stored separately from logic (easy to update)
* Analytics tracking which variants shown most

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding (logic engine) + Martin (content review/testing)

tasks.title: Conditional logic engine
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Core decision engine for insight variant selection

**Algorithm:**

1. Parse user's answers for the group
2. Identify most critical issue (priority ranking)
3. Select highest-priority insight variant
4. Ensure fact relates to their specific situation
5. Provide action that addresses today's theme

**Example Decision Tree:**

```
Priority Analysis:
1. Safety issues (P0): Sleep apnea symptoms, severe insomnia
2. Major behavioral issues (P1): Irregular schedule, high caffeine
3. Optimization opportunities (P2): Temperature, environment
4. Minor issues (P3): Napping, weekend variations
```

**Technical:**

* Rule-based system with priority weights
* Extensible for adding new rules
* Dry-run mode for testing without affecting users
* Logging for debugging which rules triggered

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Swipeable card interface
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Instagram/TikTok-style vertical swipe navigation

**User Flow:**

1. User completes last question in group
2. Swipes up â†’ Celebration screen
3. Swipes up â†’ Insight Card 1 (ðŸ’¡ Personalized)
4. Swipes up â†’ Insight Card 2 (ðŸ§  Did You Know)
5. Swipes up â†’ Insight Card 3 (âœ… Action Item)
6. Swipes up â†’ Day complete, back to home

**Gestures:**

* Vertical swipe: Next card (primary)
* Horizontal swipe: Previous card (if needed)
* Tap: Expand card details (optional)
* Pull down: Exit flow (confirmation dialog)

**Animation:**

* Smooth card transitions (300ms)
* Parallax effect on background
* Haptic feedback on swipe completion

**Assignment:** Christophe (UX flow) + AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Notification scheduling (daily unlock)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Push notifications for daily group unlocks

**Notification Types:**

1. **Daily unlock:** "Day 4 is ready! ðŸŒ™" (at user's chosen time)
2. **Reminder:** "Don't forget Day 3" (if skipped for 12 hours)
3. **Streak risk:** "Keep your 5-day streak alive" (if about to break)
4. **Milestone:** "You're halfway there! Day 7 awaits"

**Technical:**

* Local notifications (primary)
* Push notifications (backup, requires permission)
* Timezone-aware scheduling
* Quiet hours: Don't notify between 10 PM - 7 AM
* Opt-out per notification type

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Content: Write 42 insight variants
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Write all insight card content with conditional variants

**Structure:**

* 14 groups Ã— 3 cards = 42 insight cards
* Each card has 3-6 conditional variants
* Total: \~200-250 unique text snippets

**Tone:**

* Direct, informative, personal
* Evidence-based (cite research where relevant)
* Non-judgmental but honest
* Actionable and encouraging

**Example Structure:**

```
Group 1, Card 1 (ðŸ’¡ Personalized):
- Variant A: For quality_score 8-10 + not refreshed
- Variant B: For quality_score 6-7
- Variant C: For quality_score 4-5
- Variant D: For quality_score 1-3
- Variant E: For quality_score high + feels refreshed (positive reinforcement)
```

**Deliverables:**

* Content spreadsheet with all variants
* Mapping of conditions to variants
* Medical accuracy review

**Assignment:** Martin (content creation and medical review)

tasks.title: Content: Map conditional logic
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Map which insight variants show for which answer patterns

**Deliverables:**

* Decision trees for all 42 insights
* Priority rankings for overlapping conditions
* Edge case handling (e.g., all neutral answers)
* Default fallback insights

**Example:**

```
Group 3 (Temperature):
IF hot AND cold: Show "fluctuating temp" insight
ELSE IF only_hot: Show "cooling strategies" insight
ELSE IF only_cold: Show "warming strategies" insight
ELSE: Show "optimal temp" general insight

Priority: Fluctuating > Too hot > Too cold > Neutral
```

**Assignment:** Martin (logic mapping) + AI Vibe Coding (implementation)

tasks.title: Content: Medical/scientific review
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Ensure all content is medically accurate and evidence-based

**Requirements:**

* Review all 200+ text snippets for accuracy
* Cite research for key claims
* Ensure disclaimers where appropriate
* Avoid making medical diagnoses
* Flag potential liability issues
* Verify sleep science facts

**Red Flags to Check:**

* Any mention of diagnoses (sleep apnea, insomnia, etc.)
* Medication interactions
* Health claims that need substantiation
* Advice that could be harmful if misapplied

**Assignment:** Martin (coordinate medical review, potentially external sleep medicine consultant)

full_issue.title: Component 2: Daily App Use
full_issue.description:
## Overview

Daily engagement system with morning and evening check-ins, plus intervention management.

## Key Features

### Morning Check-In (6 Metrics)

* **Focus:** % change vs 30-day average (large and prominent)
* Total Sleep Time: 7h 32m (â†‘ 8.2%)
* Bedtime Regularity: Variance 28min (â†‘ 12.5%)
* Sleep Latency: 12min (â†“ 23.1%)
* Sleep Architecture: Deep/Light/REM/Awake breakdown
* Charge (HRV Recovery): +12ms (â†‘ 18.2%)
* Resting Heart Rate: 58bpm (â†“ 3.2%)

### Evening Check-In

* Activity metrics with % change
* Today's workouts with HR zones
* Cardiovascular load calculation
* Intervention compliance tracking
* Optional notes per intervention

### My Interventions Tab

* Current interventions list with weekly compliance
* Detail view with schedule, progress, expected outcomes
* Past interventions archive
* Notes system (user notes)

### Ambient Content

* Morning: Sunrise gradients, Forest Dawn audio
* Evening: Sunset gradients, Rain on Window audio
* Auto-plays at 30% volume, user can mute

## Estimated Effort

* **Total:** 398-534 hours (10-13 weeks)
* Morning Check-In: 164-224 hours
* Evening Check-In: 156-204 hours
* My Interventions: 78-106 hours

## Key Tasks

* Apple Health data fetching and aggregation
* 30-day baseline calculations
* % change calculation engine
* Sleep architecture visualization
* HRV-based recovery score
* Cardiovascular load algorithm
* Intervention compliance tracking
* Ambient audio/visual integration

## Assignments

* **Martin:** Testing coordination, QA
* **Christophe:** Metric card designs, visualizations, ambient content
* **AI Vibe Coding:** Backend calculations, UI implementation, data processing

tasks.title: Morning: Charge (HRV) calculation
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** HRV-based recovery score (similar to Whoop/Oura)

**Algorithm:**

* Compare today's morning HRV to yesterday's
* Also show % vs 30-day average
* Status: "Ready for activity" or "Prioritize recovery"

**HRV Thresholds:**

* +10% or more: Excellent recovery
* +5% to +10%: Good recovery
* \-5% to +5%: Normal (neutral)
* \-5% to -10%: Below baseline, take it easy
* \-10% or worse: Poor recovery, rest day

**Display:**

* Today: 68 ms
* Yesterday: 56 ms
* Recovery: +12 ms (â†‘ 21.4%)
* Status badge: "Ready for activity" (green)

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

tasks.title: Morning: Data aggregation & processing
tasks.description:

1. Fetch raw sleep samples from HealthKit
2. Aggregate into sleep duration, stages
3. Calculate derived metrics (efficiency, latency)
4. Compute baselines and comparisons
5. Cache processed data

**Edge Cases:**

* Multiple sleep sessions per night
* Naps (exclude or include?)
* Missing data (device not worn)
* Data corrections/deletions

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding

full_issue.title: Component 3: Full Sleep Report
full_issue.description:
## Overview

Comprehensive sleep analysis combining 14-day onboarding data with 90 days of Apple Health data.

## Report Structure

### Executive Summary

* Overall sleep health score (0-100)
* Sleep archetype classification (6 types)
* Top 3 quick wins (lowest effort, highest impact)
* 6-month and 12-month improvement projections

### 8 Analysis Sections

1. **Sleep Quantity** - Duration, consistency
2. **Sleep Quality** - Architecture, efficiency
3. **Sleep Regularity & Timing** - Schedule, circadian alignment
4. **Environment** - Temperature, light, noise, bedroom
5. **Activity** - Exercise, movement, intensity
6. **Lifestyle** - Caffeine, alcohol, meals, screens
7. **Metabolic Health** - Weight, eating patterns, supplements
8. **Mental Health** - Stress, anxiety, mood

Each section includes:

* Score (0-100)
* Top 3 Strengths
* Top 3 Areas to Improve (with effort/impact scores)
* Connections to other sections

### 1-Year Roadmap

* Quarterly milestones (Q1-Q4)
* Monthly task breakdown (max 2 tasks/month = 24 tasks/year)
* Priority-based scheduling (P0 â†’ P1 â†’ P2 â†’ P3)
* Detailed task instructions with tracking metrics

## Features

* **Coach Presentation Mode** - Progressive section unveiling
* **PDF Export** - Full report download
* **Interactive Charts** - Sleep trends, architecture, roadmap timeline

## Estimated Effort

* **Development:** 440-620 hours
* **Content Creation:** 360-480 hours
* **Total:** 800-1,100 hours (20-28 weeks)

## Key Tasks

* 8 section-specific logic engines (MAJOR - 80-120 hrs)
* Sleep archetype classification algorithm
* Issue prioritization with effort/impact scoring
* 1-year roadmap generator (max 2 tasks/month)
* Task library creation (200+ tasks)
* Coach presentation mode with progressive unveiling
* Medical/scientific content review

## Assignments

* **Martin:** Content creation (240+ texts), task library, medical review coordination
* **Christophe:** Data visualizations, chart designs, section UI templates
* **AI Vibe Coding:** Logic engines, algorithms, report generation
* **Baher:** Coach presentation mode interface

tasks.title: Report: Executive summary generation
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Generate overall sleep health summary

**Algorithm:**

1. Calculate overall score (0-100) from 8 section scores
2. Determine sleep archetype based on pattern analysis
3. Identify top 3 quick wins (lowest effort, highest impact)
4. Project 6-month and 12-month improvement potential

**Sleep Archetypes:**

* The Optimizer: Good sleep, wants great
* The Irregular: Quality varies wildly
* The Short Sleeper: Duration issue
* The Restless: Quality issue (awakenings)
* The Night Owl: Circadian misalignment
* The Compensator: Weekday-weekend gap

**Output:**

* Overall score with color
* Archetype with description
* Top 3 quick wins
* Improvement projections

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding
**Estimated Time:** 20-28 hours

tasks.title: Report: Sleep archetype algorithm
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Classify user's sleep pattern into archetype

**Decision Tree:**

```
IF quality >= 8 AND duration >= 7.5h:
    â†’ "The Optimizer"
ELSE IF bedtime_variance > 90min:
    â†’ "The Irregular"
ELSE IF avg_duration < 6.5h:
    â†’ "The Short Sleeper"
ELSE IF awakenings > 3:
    â†’ "The Restless"
ELSE IF avg_bedtime > 1 AM:
    â†’ "The Night Owl"
ELSE IF weekend_sleep - weekday_sleep > 2h:
    â†’ "The Compensator"
```

**Data Sources:**

* 90 days Apple Health
* 14-day onboarding responses
* Calculated metrics

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding
**Estimated Time:** 16-24 hours

tasks.title: Report: 8 section-specific logic engines
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Generate analysis for each of 8 sections

**THIS IS A MAJOR FEATURE - 80-120 hours**

**Sections:**

1. Sleep Quantity
2. Sleep Quality
3. Sleep Regularity & Timing
4. Environment
5. Activity
6. Lifestyle
7. Metabolic Health
8. Mental Health

**Per Section Logic:**

* Calculate section score (0-100)
* Identify 3 strengths from data
* Identify 3+ issues with priority
* Calculate effort/impact scores
* Generate findings text
* Link to related sections

**Example (Section 1 - Sleep Quantity):**

```python
def analyze_sleep_quantity(user_data):
    avg_duration = user_data.avg_sleep_duration
    score = calculate_quantity_score(avg_duration)
    
    strengths = []
    if avg_duration >= 7.5:
        strengths.append("Consistently achieving recommended duration")
    
    issues = []
    if avg_duration < 6.5:
        issues.append({
            "priority": "P1",
            "text": "Sleep duration below minimum",
            "effort": 2,
            "impact": 9
        })
    
    return section_report
```

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding (complex algorithms)
**Estimated Time:** 80-120 hours

* Q4: Maintenance (sustain progress)

* 12-24 monthly tasks
* Each task includes effort, impact, duration

full_issue.title: Component 4: Coach Dashboard
full_issue.description:
## Overview

Web-based admin interface for sleep coaches to manage customers and interventions.

## Key Features

### Customer Management

* **Customer List:** Search, filter, sort by compliance/status
* **Customer Profiles:** 5 tabs (Overview, Onboarding, Stats, Interventions, Messages)
* **Onboarding Data View:** All 84 questions and responses
* **Apple Health Stats:** Sleep, activity, HRV trends with charts
* **Alert System:** Low compliance, unusual metrics, intervention endings

### Intervention Library Management (CRITICAL SYSTEM)

* **Full CRUD Operations** (264-352 hours - 6-8 weeks)
* **Create:** 5-step wizard for new interventions
* **Read:** Detailed intervention views with evidence, outcomes, safety
* **Update:** Edit with version tracking and approval workflow
* **Delete/Archive:** Soft delete with impact assessment

### Intervention Assignment

* **3-Step Wizard:**
  1. Select intervention from library
  2. Configure schedule (frequency, duration, implementation details)
  3. Preview and confirm
* **Frequency Options:** Daily, 6/week, 5/week, 3/week, custom
* **Duration Options:** 1-12 weeks with presets
* **Coach Notes:** Internal notes on why assigned, what to monitor

### Active Intervention Management

* View customer's current interventions
* Edit schedules (extend/modify)
* End early (with reason)
* Monitor compliance in real-time

### Analytics & Reporting

* Coach performance metrics
* Customer success rates
* Intervention effectiveness
* Response times

## Tech Stack

* Next.js 14+ (App Router, TypeScript)
* Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
* React Query, Zustand
* Responsive design (desktop-first, mobile view-only)

## Estimated Effort

* **Total:** 660-912 hours (16-23 weeks)
* Intervention CRUD: 264-352 hours (CRITICAL - 6-8 weeks)
* Customer management: 140-180 hours
* Apple Health integration: 80-100 hours
* Assignment flow: 80-100 hours
* Testing: 32-40 hours

## Key Tasks

* Next.js project setup
* Authentication system (JWT, role-based)
* Customer list and profiles
* Onboarding data display (all 84 questions)
* Apple Health stats integration with charts
* **Intervention CRUD (150+ fields per intervention)**
* Assignment flow (3-step wizard)
* Active interventions management
* Coach notes system
* Alert/notification system
* Analytics dashboard

## Assignments

* **Baher:** ALL COACH DASHBOARD TASKS (human coding - not AI)
  * This is the core coach interface
  * Requires human judgment for UX flows
  * Security-critical authentication
  * Complex intervention management
* **Christophe:** Chart designs, visualization specs
* **Martin:** Testing coordination, UAT with coaches

tasks.title: Coach: Intervention CRUD operations
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Create, Read, Update, Delete interventions in library

**THIS IS A MAJOR FEATURE - 264-352 hours estimated**

**Create Intervention (5-step wizard):**

**Step 1: Basic Info**

* Name (text input)
* Category (Supplement/Lifestyle)
* Subcategory (dropdown)
* Icon selection
* Color theme picker
* Evidence score (0-10 slider)
* Number of supporting studies

**Step 2: Implementation Windows**

* Recommended duration (weeks)
* Minimum duration
* Maximum duration
* Available duration options (checkboxes: 1w, 2w, 3w, 4w, 6w, 8w, 12w, custom)
* Rationale for each

**Step 3: Frequency Options**

* Recommended frequency (Daily, 6/week, 5/week, as-needed)
* Available frequencies (multi-select)
* Rest day importance (yes/no)
* Rationale

**Step 4: Duration Impact Timeline**

* Week 1 expected outcome
* Week 2 expected outcome
* Week 4 expected outcome
* Additional milestones
* Percentage of users experiencing each

**Step 5: Content & Safety**

* Primary benefit (one sentence)
* User-facing instructions
* Safety rating (High/Moderate/Caution)
* Contraindications (list)
* Drug interactions (list)
* Special notes

**Read (View):**

* Full intervention details
* Usage statistics
* Edit history
* Assigned customers list

**Update (Edit):**

* All fields editable
* Version tracking
* Change log
* Approval workflow for senior coaches
* Warning if intervention is currently assigned

**Delete/Archive:**

* Archive (soft delete) - preserves history
* Hard delete (only if never assigned)
* Archive reason required
* Confirmation dialog with impact assessment

**Additional Features:**

* Duplicate intervention (for creating variants)
* Bulk operations (archive multiple, export, update category)
* Import/Export (JSON format)
* Version history
* Approval workflow

**Data Model (150+ fields):**

* Basic info (name, type, evidence, etc.)
* Implementation (dosage, timing, duration options)
* Outcomes (expected benefits with percentages)
* Safety (contraindications, interactions)
* Content (instructions, rationale)
* Metadata (created_by, updated_at, version)

**Assignment:** Baher (human coding - CRITICAL SYSTEM)
**Estimated Time:** 264-352 hours (this is 6-8 weeks of focused work)
**Note:** This is the core of the coach dashboard. Consider breaking into smaller phases.

tasks.title: Coach: Archive/restore functionality
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Archive interventions without deleting

**Archive Flow:**

1. Click Archive button
2. Show impact: "Currently assigned to X customers"
3. Select reason (dropdown):
   * Replaced by better alternative
   * Evidence no longer supports use
   * Safety concerns

**Archive Effects:**

* Hidden from assignment search
* Existing assignments continue
* Preserved in history
* Visible in "Archived" filter

* View archived interventions
* Click Restore
* Confirm
* Returns to active library

tasks.title: Coach: Delete with safety checks
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Permanently delete interventions (rarely used)

**Safety Checks:**

1. Prevent if ever assigned to customers
2. Warning dialog with impact
3. Require typing intervention name to confirm
4. Require admin permission for hard delete

**Recommended Flow:**

* Prefer Archive over Delete
* Show recommendation: "Consider archiving instead"
* Only allow delete if:
  * Never assigned to any customer
  * No historical data references
  * Admin role

**Assignment:** Baher (human coding - high risk operation)
**Estimated Time:** 8-12 hours

tasks.title: Coach: Assignment flow (3-step wizard)
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Assign intervention to customer with schedule

**Step 1: Select Intervention**

* Search/browse intervention library
* Preview intervention details
* Evidence score and success rate visible

**Step 2: Configure Schedule**

* **Frequency:**
  * Daily (7 days/week)
  * 6 days/week (choose rest day)
  * 5 days/week (weekdays)
  * Custom schedule
* **Duration:**
  * Slider with presets (1w, 2w, 3w, 4w, 6w, 8w, 12w)
  * Show recommended duration
  * Start date picker (default: today)
  * Auto-calculate end date
* **Implementation Details:**
  * Dosage (if supplement)
  * Timing (morning, evening, before bed)
  * Form (powder, capsule, etc.)
  * Custom instructions to user
* **Coach Notes (internal):**
  * Why assigned (text area)
  * What to monitor (checkboxes + text)
  * Expected outcomes

**Step 3: Preview & Confirm**

* Summary of assignment
* Total scheduled days
* Instructions preview
* What user will see
* Confirm button

**Post-Assignment:**

* User notification sent
* Appears in user's app immediately
* Coach sees confirmation
* Added to customer profile

tasks.title: Coach: Alert/notification system
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Flag important events and concerns

**Alert Types:**

1. **Low Compliance**
   * <50% for 2+ weeks
   * Action: "Check in with customer"
2. **Unusual Metrics**
   * HRV drop >20% for 3+ days
   * Sleep duration drop >2 hours
   * Resting HR elevated >10%
3. **Intervention Ending**
   * 3 days before completion
   * Action: "Review outcomes, assign next"
4. **Missing Data**
   * No Apple Health sync >3 days
   * No check-in >48 hours
5. **Customer Message**
   * Unread message >24 hours

**Alert Display:**

* Badge count on navigation
* Alert panel on dashboard
* Dismiss or take action
* Snooze for later

**Assignment:** Baher (human coding)
**Estimated Time:** 20-28 hours

full_issue.title: Component 5: Supporting Systems
full_issue.description:
## Overview

Robust backend infrastructure supporting all platform components.

## Critical Backend Architecture

### Database Schema (PostgreSQL)

**1. Onboarding System**

* users, onboarding_questions (84 from Excel), onboarding_groups (14 days)
* onboarding_responses, onboarding_insights (42 insights)

**2. Interventions System (150+ fields per intervention)**

* interventions (library with evidence, duration options, safety, instructions)
* user_interventions (assignments with schedule, compliance)
* intervention_compliance (daily tracking)
* intervention_user_notes, intervention_coach_notes

**3. Coach Dashboard Support**

* coaches (roles, permissions)
* customer_coach_assignments
* alerts (low compliance, unusual metrics)
* messages (coach-customer communication)

**4. Health Data Storage**

* user_sleep_data (from Apple Health)
* user_sleep_stages (detailed stage tracking)
* user_heart_rate (resting HR, HRV)
* user_activity (steps, exercise, calories)
* user_workouts (with HR zones)
* user_baselines (30-day rolling averages)

**5. Sleep Report System**

* sleep_reports, report_sections (8 sections)
* report_roadmap (quarterly milestones, monthly tasks)

### API Layer (60+ endpoints)

* Authentication (register, login, refresh, reset)
* Onboarding (groups, questions, responses, insights)
* Interventions - User (active, past, complete, notes)
* Interventions - Coach (CRUD, assign, edit, end)
* Coach Dashboard (customers, profiles, health stats, alerts)
* Health Data (sync, sleep, activity, baselines)
* Sleep Report (generate, view, PDF, sections)
* Daily Check-ins (morning, evening, complete)

### Real-time Features (WebSockets)

* Coach dashboard live updates
* New intervention notifications
* Alert broadcasts

### Background Jobs

* Daily baseline calculations (3 AM)
* Alert generation (hourly)
* Report generation queue
* Data cleanup (monthly)

### Apple Health Integration

**Data Types:**

* Sleep: Analysis, stages (deep/light/REM), efficiency
* Heart: Resting HR, HRV (morning reading), HR during sleep
* Activity: Steps, active energy, exercise minutes, workouts
* Respiratory: Rate during sleep, blood oxygen (Series 6+)

**Sync Strategy:**

* Background fetch daily (6 AM)
* Manual refresh on app open
* Historical backfill (90 days first sync)
* Incremental updates

### Security (HIPAA Considerations)

* JWT authentication with refresh tokens
* Password hashing (bcrypt, 12 rounds)
* Encryption at rest for health data
* TLS 1.3 for data transmission
* Audit logs for data access
* Rate limiting on all endpoints
* SQL injection prevention
* XSS protection

### Performance

* Database indexing on key fields
* Redis caching for baselines and frequently accessed data
* Query optimization
* Pagination for large datasets
* CDN for static assets

## Estimated Effort

* **Total:** 200-280 hours (5-7 weeks)
* Apple Health integration: 80-120 hours
* Backend infrastructure: 60-80 hours
* Authentication & security: 40-60 hours
* Notification system: 20-30 hours

## Key Tasks

* Elaborate backend schema design (supports onboarding, interventions, coach dashboard, app use)
* API layer for all components
* Apple Health HealthKit integration
* Authentication & security (JWT, HIPAA-aware)
* Push notifications (APNs) and email (SendGrid)
* Background job processing
* Real-time WebSocket updates
* Redis caching layer

## Assignments

* **AI Vibe Coding:** All backend infrastructure
  * Database schema and migrations
  * API endpoints (60+)
  * HealthKit integration
  * Background jobs
  * WebSocket server
* **Martin:** Security review, HIPAA compliance verification

tasks.title: Support: Apple Health integration
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Comprehensive Apple Health data synchronization

**Data Types to Fetch:**

1. **Sleep Analysis:**
   * HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis
   * In bed time, asleep time
   * Sleep stages (deep, light, REM, awake)
   * Requires iOS 16+ and compatible Apple Watch
2. **Heart Rate:**
   * Resting heart rate (overnight average)
   * Heart rate variability (HRV) - morning reading
   * Heart rate during sleep
   * Heart rate during workouts
3. **Activity:**
   * Step count
   * Active energy burned
   * Exercise minutes
   * Stand hours
   * Workout sessions with details
4. **Respiratory:**
   * Respiratory rate during sleep
   * Blood oxygen (if available, Series 6+)

**Sync Strategy:**

* Background fetch (daily at 6 AM)
* Manual refresh on app open
* Historical backfill (90 days on first sync)
* Incremental updates (only new data)

**Data Storage:**

* Raw data cached locally
* Synced to backend every 24h
* Aggregate metrics computed client-side
* Server stores processed metrics only

**Error Handling:**

* Handle missing data gracefully
* Detect Apple Watch not worn
* Handle device changes
* Data deletion detection

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding (HealthKit APIs)
**Estimated Time:** 80-120 hours

tasks.title: Support: Backend infrastructure
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Robust backend supporting all system components

**CRITICAL: ELABORATE BACKEND ARCHITECTURE**

**Tech Stack:**

* Node.js + Express (or Python + FastAPI)
* PostgreSQL for relational data
* Redis for caching and sessions
* AWS S3 for file storage (PDFs, exports)
* WebSockets for real-time updates

**Database Schema (Major Tables):**

**1. Onboarding System:**

```sql
-- Users
users (id, email, name, created_at, apple_health_connected)

-- 84 Questions from Excel File
onboarding_questions (
    id, group_id, question_text, question_type,
    options_json, validation_rules, order_num
)

onboarding_groups (
    id, day_num, name, description, 
    unlock_time, theme_colors
)

-- User Responses
onboarding_responses (
    id, user_id, question_id, response_value,
    answered_at
)

-- Generated Insights
onboarding_insights (
    id, user_id, group_id, insight_type,
    insight_text, generated_at
)
```

**2. Interventions System:**

```sql
-- Intervention Library (150+ fields)
interventions (
    id, name, type, category, evidence_score,
    recommended_duration_weeks, min_duration, max_duration,
    recommended_frequency, available_frequencies_json,
    duration_impact_json, safety_rating,
    contraindications_json, interactions_json,
    primary_benefit, instructions_text,
    created_by_coach_id, status, version,
    created_at, updated_at
)

-- Assigned Interventions
user_interventions (
    id, user_id, intervention_id, assigned_by_coach_id,
    start_date, end_date, frequency, schedule_json,
    dosage, timing, form, custom_instructions,
    status, assigned_at
)

-- Compliance Tracking
intervention_compliance (
    id, user_intervention_id, scheduled_date,
    completed, completed_at, note_text
)

-- User Notes on Interventions
intervention_user_notes (
    id, user_intervention_id, note_text,
    mood_rating, created_at
)

-- Coach Notes (internal)
intervention_coach_notes (
    id, user_intervention_id, coach_id,
    note_text, tags_json, created_at
)
```

**3. Coach Dashboard Support:**

```sql
-- Coaches
coaches (
    id, email, name, role, permissions_json,
    created_at
)

-- Customer-Coach Assignment
customer_coach_assignments (
    id, user_id, coach_id, assigned_at, status
)

-- Alerts
alerts (
    id, user_id, coach_id, alert_type,
    severity, message, data_json,
    resolved, created_at, resolved_at
)

-- Messages
messages (
    id, from_user_id, to_user_id, message_text,
    read_at, created_at
)
```

**4. Health Data Storage:**

```sql
-- Apple Health Sleep Data
user_sleep_data (
    id, user_id, date, in_bed_time, asleep_time,
    wake_time, total_sleep_mins, sleep_efficiency,
    deep_sleep_mins, light_sleep_mins, rem_sleep_mins,
    awake_mins, interruptions_count, sleep_latency_mins,
    synced_at
)

-- Sleep Stages (detailed)
user_sleep_stages (
    id, user_id, date, start_time, end_time,
    stage, duration_mins
)

-- Heart Rate Data
user_heart_rate (
    id, user_id, date, resting_hr, avg_hr,
    hrv_morning, hrv_avg, synced_at
)

-- Activity Data
user_activity (
    id, user_id, date, steps, active_mins,
    exercise_mins, calories_burned, synced_at
)

-- Workouts
user_workouts (
    id, user_id, date, workout_type, start_time,
    duration_mins, avg_hr, max_hr, calories,
    distance_km, intensity_zones_json
)

-- Baselines (30-day rolling averages)
user_baselines (
    id, user_id, metric_name, baseline_value,
    calculated_at, period_days
)
```

**5. Sleep Report System:**

```sql
sleep_reports (
    id, user_id, generated_at, overall_score,
    archetype, report_data_json, pdf_url
)

report_sections (
    id, report_id, section_num, name, score,
    strengths_json, issues_json, findings_json
)

report_roadmap (
    id, report_id, quarterly_milestones_json,
    monthly_tasks_json
)
```

**API Endpoints:**

**Authentication:**

* POST /api/auth/register
* POST /api/auth/login
* POST /api/auth/logout
* POST /api/auth/refresh
* POST /api/auth/reset-password

**Onboarding:**

* GET /api/onboarding/groups
* GET /api/onboarding/questions/:groupId
* POST /api/onboarding/responses
* GET /api/onboarding/insights/:groupId

**Interventions (User):**

* GET /api/user/interventions/active
* GET /api/user/interventions/past
* GET /api/user/interventions/:id
* POST /api/user/interventions/:id/complete
* POST /api/user/interventions/:id/note

**Interventions (Coach):**

* GET /api/coach/interventions/library
* POST /api/coach/interventions (create)
* PUT /api/coach/interventions/:id (update)
* DELETE /api/coach/interventions/:id (archive)
* POST /api/coach/interventions/assign
* PUT /api/coach/interventions/assigned/:id
* DELETE /api/coach/interventions/assigned/:id/end

**Coach Dashboard:**

* GET /api/coach/customers
* GET /api/coach/customers/:id/profile
* GET /api/coach/customers/:id/onboarding
* GET /api/coach/customers/:id/health-stats
* GET /api/coach/customers/:id/interventions
* GET /api/coach/alerts
* POST /api/coach/notes

**Health Data:**

* POST /api/health/sync (bulk upload from device)
* GET /api/health/sleep/:date
* GET /api/health/activity/:date
* GET /api/health/baselines

**Sleep Report:**

* POST /api/reports/generate
* GET /api/reports/:id
* GET /api/reports/:id/pdf
* GET /api/reports/:id/section/:sectionNum

**Daily Check-ins:**

* GET /api/checkin/morning
* GET /api/checkin/evening
* POST /api/checkin/complete

**Middleware:**

* Authentication (JWT)
* Rate limiting
* Request validation
* Error handling
* Logging
* CORS

**Background Jobs:**

* Daily baseline calculations (3 AM)
* Alert generation (hourly)
* Report generation queue
* Data cleanup (monthly)

**Real-time Features (WebSockets):**

* Coach dashboard live updates
* New intervention notifications
* Alert broadcasts

**Security:**

* Password hashing (bcrypt)
* JWT with refresh tokens
* SQL injection prevention
* XSS protection
* HIPAA considerations for health data
* Encryption at rest for sensitive data

**Performance:**

* Database indexing on key fields
* Redis caching for frequently accessed data
* Query optimization
* Pagination for large datasets
* CDN for static assets

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding (complex backend)
**Estimated Time:** 60-80 hours for initial setup, ongoing development

tasks.title: Support: Authentication & security
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Secure authentication for users and coaches

**User Authentication:**

* Email/password signup
* Email verification
* OAuth (Apple Sign-In)
* JWT tokens
* Refresh token rotation

**Coach Authentication:**

* Separate login portal
* Role-based permissions
* Multi-factor authentication (optional)
* Session management
* Activity logging

**Security Measures:**

* Password requirements (8+ chars, uppercase, number, symbol)
* Bcrypt hashing (12 rounds)
* Rate limiting on auth endpoints
* Account lockout after 5 failed attempts
* HTTPS only
* Secure headers (Helmet.js)
* CSRF tokens
* XSS prevention

**HIPAA Considerations:**

* Encrypted data transmission (TLS 1.3)
* Encrypted data at rest
* Audit logs for data access
* Access controls
* Business Associate Agreements

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding (security critical)
**Estimated Time:** 40-60 hours

tasks.title: Support: Notification system
tasks.description:
**Purpose:** Push notifications and emails

**Notification Types:**

**Push Notifications (iOS):**

1. Daily unlock reminder (8 AM)
2. Intervention due soon (30 min before)
3. Streak at risk (if missed checkin)
4. Sleep report ready
5. Message from coach

**Email Notifications:**

1. Welcome email
2. Onboarding progress (Day 7, Day 14)
3. Intervention assigned
4. Sleep report generated
5. Weekly summary

**Coach Notifications:**

1. New customer assigned
2. Customer sent message
3. Alert triggered (low compliance, unusual metrics)
4. Intervention completion

**Implementation:**

* APNs for iOS push notifications
* SendGrid/Postmark for emails
* Notification preferences per user
* Quiet hours (10 PM - 7 AM)
* Timezone-aware scheduling
* Delivery tracking
* Unsubscribe handling

**Template System:**

* Handlebars templates
* Personalization variables
* A/B testing support

**Assignment:** AI Vibe Coding
**Estimated Time:** 20-30 hours
